# This file was generated by the YaTool build system (https://github.com/yandex/yatool),
# from a source YaTool build configuration provided in ya.make files.
#
# If the repository supports both CMake and ya build configurations, please modify both of them.
#
# If only CMake build configuration is supported then modify only CMake files and note that only
# simple modifications are allowed like adding source-files to targets or adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories. These modifications will be ported to original ya.make files
# by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be easily ported back to the ya build
# system may be rejected.
#
# Please refer to the build instructions in the repository for more information about manual
# changes in this file.

add_executable(replication-controller-ut_target_discoverer)


target_compile_options(replication-controller-ut_target_discoverer PRIVATE
  -DUSE_CURRENT_UDF_ABI_VERSION
)

target_include_directories(replication-controller-ut_target_discoverer PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/tx/replication/controller
)

target_link_libraries(replication-controller-ut_target_discoverer PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  cpp-testing-unittest_main
  tx-replication-controller
  tx-replication-ut_helpers
  cpp-testing-unittest
)

target_allocator(replication-controller-ut_target_discoverer
  system_allocator
)

target_link_options(replication-controller-ut_target_discoverer PRIVATE
  -Wl,-platform_version,macos,11.0,11.0
  -fPIC
  -fPIC
  -framework
  CoreFoundation
)

target_sources(replication-controller-ut_target_discoverer PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/tx/replication/controller/target_discoverer_ut.cpp
)


set_property(
  TARGET
  replication-controller-ut_target_discoverer
  PROPERTY
  SPLIT_FACTOR
  10
)

add_yunittest(
  NAME
  replication-controller-ut_target_discoverer
  TEST_TARGET
  replication-controller-ut_target_discoverer
  TEST_ARG
  --print-before-suite
  --print-before-test
  --fork-tests
  --print-times
  --show-fails
)

set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  replication-controller-ut_target_discoverer
  PROPERTY
  LABELS
  MEDIUM
)

set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  replication-controller-ut_target_discoverer
  PROPERTY
  ENVIRONMENT
)

vcs_info(replication-controller-ut_target_discoverer)

set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  replication-controller-ut_target_discoverer
  PROPERTY
  PROCESSORS
  1
)
